subject: Fwd: Order #SSN4003, how did it go?
description_text:
Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback
 
 
As pictured and per statement above.....Haptics and Rgb not in order.
 
vr
JimB

> Subject: Order #SSN4003, how did it go?
>

> Hello James, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. conversations.body_text: Hi JAMES BROYLES,     Please try using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 and follow the update process for your pedals. If the issue persists, please provide photos so we can check the problem. Make sure to use the USB 3.0 blue port on the back of your PC, and do not use a hub. Also, check if the upgrade button on the control box has been pressed incorrectly; it should be released, then reinsert the USB to enter normal working mode.      ProX / ProX Ultra Pedal Firmware Update Procedure:    Press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    The software will indicate that the device has entered “Simsonn Flasher mode”;    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu (If it’s a ProX pedal, select pedals-prox.sfu)    Start the firmware update, and once it is complete, release the Upgrade button;    Finally, retest and calibrate the pedals.
